meta.name: VoiceActivity
meta.description: Shows icons and info in popouts, the member list, and more when someone is in a voice channel.
meta.author: Neodymium

changelog.title: Fixed
items: Fixed plugin not working after Discord's latest update.

changelog.title: However...
items: The Modal section and possibly some other items are still broken and have been disabled. I'll try to fix them as soon as I can.
